name: Google Images - Dark Gray Wood Design
description:
-------------------------------- Last Updated September 13th, 2010 -----------------------------------------------------------
CHANGE LOG : Fixes for Google Instant, Fixes for International Google Sites, Fixes for US google [ONLY IMAGES AND WEB]
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
YOUTUBE LAYOUT: http://userstyles.org/styles/17653
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Hey guys,

I just updated the style so that it supports the new Google Instant feature, Currently this feature
Is only live for the US Google site so I had to redesign a huge chunk of code. Hopefully everything is
in working order and I didn't miss any vital sections. Again not everything is styled just the main bulk ect.

Note: I am currently working on a windscreen fix for the Google Instant layout so for the time being
fullscreen searches wont be available while browsing using the Instant feature.

Features:
- Full redesign compatible with the new GOOGLE INSTANT feature
- Works With Google Search, Google Images and Google Video
- Advertisements are Hidden
- Widescreen Fix for Widescreen Monitors (will fill your window no matter what size)
- Removed Google Logos redesigned to fit with the dark theme

Anyway if you like this or somethings not working, leave me some feed back :D
